example.name: sometimes direct
example.text: Jumping in on big deals is a high profile way [0]-2 [*T*]to leapfrog the problem of not having a strong retail-banking network *trace*-2.
example.arg: the problem of not having a strong retail-banking network

example.name: usually prepositional
example.text: To make it to top0 status, it would have [*] to leapfrog over such formidable forces as Grey Advertising, D'Arcy Masius Benton& Bowles and Omnicom's DDB Needham.
example.arg: over such formidable forces as Grey Advertising, D'Arcy Masius Benton& Bowles and Omnicom's DDB Needham.
